section.p: Contains information about problems encountered for the patients case.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] outcomeCategory with data type Code
Unique Identifier for the problem resolution for each problem.

Contains exactly one [1..1] problemCategory with data type Code
Contains a unique identifier for each problem encountered for the case. The problem describes issues encountered.

Contains exactly one [1..1] outcomeCategory with data type Code
Unique Identifier for the problem resolution for each problem.

Contains exactly one [1..1] problemCategory with data type Code
Contains a unique identifier for each problem encountered for the case. The problem describes issues encountered.
